DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy Seroquel XR monotherapy compare Seroquel XR plus lithium treatment acute bipolar mania evaluation change baseline Young Mania Ratings Scale ( YMRS ) total score Day 29 use last observation carry forward method .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Effectiveness Seroquel XR Seroquel XR Plus Lithium Patients With Acute Bipolar Mania : An Open-label , Randomized , Parallel Groups , Rater-blinded , 4 Week , Multicenter , Comparative , Study
DOC.detailed_description: A comparison effectiveness Seroquel XR Seroquel XR plus lithium patient acute bipolar mania : An open-label , randomize , parallel group , rater-blinded , 4 week , multicenter , comparative , phase 4 study .
DOC.criteria: Female and/or male inpatient outpatient , age 18 year 65 year Documented clinical diagnosis meeting Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th edition ( DSMIV ) criterion YMRS total score =20 enrollment randomization ( Day 1 ) Patients history least one manic episode require hospitalization and/or treatment mood stabilizer antipsychotic . Female patient must negative urine human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) test enrolment must use reliable method birth control , ie , barrier method , oral contraceptive , implant , dermal contraception , longterm injectable contraceptive Pregnancy lactation Meeting criterion ( bipolar disorder ) DSMIV Axis I diagnosis , concomitant organic mental disorder mental retardation Patients , opinion investigator , pose imminent risk suicide danger self others Administration depot antipsychotic injection within one dose interval ( depot ) randomization/baseline Known intolerance hypersensitivity , lack response previous treatment quetiapine fumarate lithium
